Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
  




public class Enemy
extends greenfoot.Actor

This code creates an object for the Enemy class that will be reusuable by the other projects. The enemy will have their own specific health (the amount of damage each object is able to take) and a general speed for all enemies. To add the health bar, addedToWorld() method must be called.

Version:
0.2.0
Author:
Shivani, Kyle, Maggie

          Creates a caterpie enemy for level 1

          Creates an enemy pokemon and sets their speed and health depending on their level.

takeDamage

public void takeDamage(int healthDecrease)
When hit by another Fighter, take the value of damage and subtract it from the Fighter's health. If Fighter's health reaches zero, remove the Fighter from the world.

Parameters:
healthDecrease - takes in the value of the damage done by the weapon
